sentence.Network_en: If you're going to take my photograph, I must go and primp prinkup a bit first.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是想给我照相的话, 我必须先稍稍打扮一下.

list.abs: ... We save you a piece of cake in the fridge. 我们给你留了块蛋糕在冰箱里。 Stop primping. 别磨蹭。 No manners. 没礼貌。.

sentences.sentence: "She likes to dress when going to the opera"

auth_sentence.content: That is hardly comfort for fans, who primp and beautify their orchids and end up infecting their entire collections.

sentences.en: Too much time is spent in primping, too little at work.
sentences.cn: 在打扮上用时太多, 在工作上用时太少。
